title: 09/04: Bell, McKinnon, Waivers and More! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
So much to catch up on from the last few days as Le'Veon Bell has not reported and Jerick McKinnon is out for the season. Is James Conner worth adding and which RB do we prefer in SF? We also react to the recent Royce Freeman news, Jonathan Williams, Antonio Gates and more ... A look at the Most Added list plus plenty of Week 1 talk as we start to look at some favorable matchups ... Week 1 Waiver Wire! Andy Dalton is just one of many players you could add this week to get a Week 1 win, but who should you drop? ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
